title: Clipboard issues on VNC X11 connections; Cannot disable syncing on VNC.
author: God-damnit-all
body_snippet:
When you are connected to an X11 desktop environment (e.g. most Ubuntu installations), any time you highlight text, it is immediately deselected and copied to the client's clipboard. This means simple actions like selecting all with Ctrl+A so you can delete the text with backspace, which is practically muscle memory to me at this point, instead causes a lot of frustration.

**This is not mRemoteNG's fault, but rather VNC's.**  X11 has two clipboards - the standard clipboard and the 'primary se...

comments.snippet:
This problem seems important since the intend of mRemoteNG is to provide connection to many VNC screen at once. In this case my clipboard becomes a mess from many VNCs copying to clipboard.

Another issue : clipboard is coped even in ViewOnly mode
